name: Galaxy S22
description: Samsung Galaxy S22 with 120Hz Dynamic AMOLED display, 50MP camera, and Exynos 2200 chipset for fast performance.

name: iPhone 14
description: Apple iPhone 14 featuring A16 Bionic chip, 48MP camera system, and Ceramic Shield for enhanced durability.

name: Pixel 7 Pro
description: Google Pixel 7 Pro with Google Tensor G2 chip, 50MP camera, and a 120Hz LTPO OLED display for smooth visuals.

name: OnePlus 10 Pro
description: OnePlus 10 Pro with Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, 120Hz Fluid AMOLED display, and a 50MP triple camera setup.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra
description: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra with a 108MP primary camera, Snapdragon 888 chipset, and a 6.81-inch AMOLED display.

name: Sony Xperia 1 IV
description: Sony Xperia 1 IV with a 4K OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, and exceptional pro-grade camera features.

name: Motorola Edge 30 Pro
description: Motorola Edge 30 Pro with Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, 50MP triple camera system, and a 144Hz OLED display.
